sentences.sentence: Besides the laboratory evidence for this, we know from our experience that we often remember what we have perceived peripherally, long after we have forgotten what we set out to learn.
sentences.translation: 除了实验室的证据外，我们从经验中知道，我们经常会在忘记自己着手学习的东西很久之后，才会记住我们在环境中感知到的东西。

sentences.sentence: This article will only peripherally touch on this topic, since our stated goal is extending the JDT.
sentences.translation: 本文只是略微提及这个主题，因为我们设定的目标是扩展JDT。

sentences.sentence: Objective To explore the clinical value of peripherally inserted central catheter (PICC) in preterm infants.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨经外周静脉置入中心静脉导管(PICC)在早产儿中应用的价值。
